com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory

Interface ServerEndpointConfigurationsFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerEndpointConfigurationsFactoryImpl

    public interface ServerEndpointConfigurationsFactory
    A factory for creating ServerEndpointConfigurations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder copy(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration) 
      ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder create() 
      ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder create(String serverAddress) 
      ServerEndpointConfiguration NULL() 

    • Method Detail

      • NULL

        ServerEndpointConfiguration NULL()
        Returns:
        Null ServerEndpointConfiguration. If this ServerEndpointConfiguration is used no server connection will be established.

      • create

        ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder create()
        Returns:
        A new instance of ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder.

      • copy

        ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder copy(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration)
        Parameters:
        serverEndpointConfiguration - The ServerEndpointConfiguration to be copied.
        Returns:
        A new instance of ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder initialized by ServerEndpointConfiguration.

      • create

        ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder create(String serverAddress)
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - The address of the server you want to connect to as ip or hostname.
        Format is servername[:port]
        Examples 30.207.192.199:4567 or localhost
        If your Acrolinx Server uses the default port you are not requested to specify it.
        Returns:
        A new instance of ServerEndpointConfigurationBuilder.
